name: King Towers

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2363700/Eukarion_Tales_2/



Engage in epic tower defense battles in King Towers! Assume the role of the King's General, tasked with thwarting the nefarious witch Stornza's plot to destroy the islands. Utilize a variety of towers, traps, and spells to strategically halt the relentless onslaught of nasty foes.

Can you safeguard the kingdom from impending doom, and give witch Strozna the colloquial “boot”?

Key Features:

Defend the Kingdom: Assume the role of the King's General and lead the defense against the horrible witch and her relentless onslaught of offensive waves!

Strategic Tower Defense: Build and upgrade towers strategically to fend off waves of enemies. Choose from a variety of military and magical towers to suit your playstyle, from rapid fire stone towers, to powerful elemental ones including a snow tower to slow down and a lava tower to blast enemies.



Diverse Enemies: Battle against a multitude of foes, from rampaging peasants and formidable knights to dark mages and ticked-off cows! Each enemy has weaknesses and strengths, so plan your defense accordingly.

Trap Placement: Lay down traps along enemy paths to hinder their progress and inflict damage upon them, from spikes to flames, take advantage of these powerful allies.

Powerful Spells: Unleash devastating spells like Ice Storms and Lightning Strikes to turn the tide of battle in your favor, but watch out, just like your gold and HP, mana can be stolen from you if you let the enemies in!



Skill Development: Level up and choose from a range of skills to enhance your strategic prowess and combat effectiveness.



Medal Rewards: Earn prestigious medals based on your performance in each mission, from Iron to Epic Gold.

Immersive Gameplay: Control the speed of the game to suit your preferences and stay vigilant against the varied bases of enemy departure.

Prepare yourself, General, for a battle of wits and magic against the forces of darkness. The fate of the kingdom rests in your hands. Will you rise to the challenge and emerge victorious, or will the islands fall into darkness? Only you can decide in King Towers!
